Package org.mobicents.slee.resource.cluster

Interface Summary
FaultTolerantResourceAdaptor<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable> Abstract class for a fault tolerant JAIN SLEE 1.1 RA
FaultTolerantResourceAdaptorContext<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable> Fault tolerant context for a FaultTolerantResourceAdaptor, gives access to replicated data and information of the SLEE cluster.
FaultTolerantTimer A Fault Tolerant timer that resembles the ScheduledExecutorService.
FaultTolerantTimerTask A task to be executed by FaultTolerantTimer, it is a simple Runnable that exposes a FaultTolerantTimerTaskData object.
FaultTolerantTimerTaskData The data containing all the necessary information which allows the recreation of the related FaultTolerantTimerTask in any cluster node.
FaultTolerantTimerTaskFactory A factory which includes the logic that (re)creates FaultTolerantTimerTask instances, from its data.
MemberAddress The identification of a cluster member.
ReplicatedData<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable> A container for serializable data, which are replicated in the SLEE cluster, but don't require any failover.
ReplicatedDataWithFailover<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable> A ReplicatedData that is replicated in the SLEE cluster and its local resources require fail over callbacks.
 

Class Summary
DataRemovalListener<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable>  
FailOverListener<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable>  
FaultTolerantResourceAdaptorContextImpl<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable> Implementation of the fault tolerant ra context.
FaultTolerantTimerImpl Implementation of the FT RA Timer.
FaultTolerantTimerTaskDataWrapper Wrapps the FT timer task data, into the task data used by Mobicents Cluster framework.
FaultTolerantTimerTaskFactoryWrapper Wrapps the FT RA Timer task factory into the factory used by Mobicents Cluster framework.
FaultTolerantTimerTaskWrapper Wrapps the FT RA timer task into the task used by Mobicents Cluster framework.
MemberAddressImpl  
ReplicatedDataCacheData<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable>  
ReplicatedDataImpl<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable>  
ReplicatedDataKeyClusteredCacheData<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable>  
ReplicatedDataWithFailoverImpl<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable>
